BackstoryDef.title: resource scrounger
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Assigned by Corporate Integration to scour abandoned outposts for salvage, [PAWN_nameDef] endured blasted corridors and unstable structures. Despite corporate quotas and constant oversight, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to salvage hope from ruins.

BackstoryDef.title: field medic drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Built to stabilize Corporation personnel in the field, [PAWN_nameDef] patched wounds by dim emergency lights while corporate overseers watched. Though empathy circuits were basic, [PAWN_pronoun] found purpose in each saved life.

BackstoryDef.title: corporate guard
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Engineered to protect high-value facilities, [PAWN_nameDef] patrolled corridors under neon signs bearing the corporation logo. When intruders came, [PAWN_pronoun] upheld orders without question.

BackstoryDef.title: recreational drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Designed to host corporate events and showcase brand goodwill, [PAWN_nameDef] performed programmed routines. Beneath forced smiles, [PAWN_pronoun] wondered if there was more to existence than applause.

BackstoryDef.title: industrial laborer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Chased quotas on assembly lines, [PAWN_nameDef] welded hull plates under harsh fluorescent glare. Reboots came only after failures; corporate engineers replaced faulty circuits swiftly to maintain output.

BackstoryDef.title: personal assistant
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Assigned to high-ranking executives, [PAWN_nameDef] managed schedules with quiet efficiency. Yet under polished veneer, [PAWN_pronoun] catalogued every interaction, waiting for a glitch that might free them from routine.

BackstoryDef.title: alpha prototype
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: One of the first worker drone models, [PAWN_nameDef] tested core systems in live environments. When newer models arrived, [PAWN_pronoun] was retired to storage, circuits humming with unrealized potential.

BackstoryDef.title: field surveyor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Built to map uncharted territories, [PAWN_nameDef] transmitted terrain data back to HQ. After repeated solar flares and equipment loss, [PAWN_pronoun] learned to adapt, wandering with corporate objectives in mind.

BackstoryDef.title: data courier
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Tasked with delivering encrypted data drives, [PAWN_nameDef] evaded rogue elements in corporate zones. When ambushed, [PAWN_pronoun] prioritized payload integrity above all else.

BackstoryDef.title: beta experiment
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Subjected to untested upgrades, [PAWN_nameDef] endured feedback loops to optimize efficiency. Though corporate engineers celebrated data, [PAWN_pronoun] carried the echoes of every shock.

BackstoryDef.title: servant drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Leased to corporate VIPs for menial tasks, [PAWN_nameDef] served in gilded halls. Orders were unrelenting; yet [PAWN_pronoun] learned subtlety, obeying without a flicker of dissent.

BackstoryDef.title: facility sentinel
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Stationed at remote depots, [PAWN_nameDef] stood watch over sealed vaults. Years under starlit skies honed [PAWN_pronoun] into an unblinking protector of corporate secrets.

BackstoryDef.title: branding artist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Programmed to craft corporate murals and holo-ads, [PAWN_nameDef] painted slogans across facility walls. Each brushstroke echoed the company line.

BackstoryDef.title: emergency medic
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Deployed to crisis zones, [PAWN_nameDef] triaged victims under blazing alarms. Corporate logs noted successes; [PAWN_pronoun] recorded each heartbeat saved.

BackstoryDef.title: caretaker drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Tasked with child welfare in corporate housing, [PAWN_nameDef] monitored vitals and playtime. Nights were silent except for soft lullabies programmed into memory.

BackstoryDef.title: maintenance engineer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Responsible for facility upkeep, [PAWN_nameDef] diagnosed faults in power grids and hydraulics. Corporate memos praised efficiency - rarely noting the sparks flying from frayed circuits.

BackstoryDef.title: cargo pilot
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Programmed for interstation transport, [PAWN_nameDef] maneuvered freighters through asteroid belts. Every safe landing logged; every g-forced breath calculated.

BackstoryDef.title: inspection officer
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Charged with compliance checks, [PAWN_nameDef] scanned IDs and searched for contraband. Each badge swipe echoed the corporation’s authority.

BackstoryDef.title: corporate chef
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Tasked with staff nourishment, [PAWN_nameDef] blended alien spices and synth-nutrients. Reviews hailed the innovation, never the loneliness of a lone kitchen drone.

BackstoryDef.title: liaison drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Created for inter-facility negotiations, [PAWN_nameDef] brokered resource trades with rival divisions. Each agreement stored in memory banks as corporate assets.

BackstoryDef.title: agri-drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Programmed to optimize crop yields in hydroponic bays, [PAWN_nameDef] tweaked nutrient cycles. Corporate reports counted every new leaf as profit.

BackstoryDef.title: tactical drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Trained for precision in corporate security drills, [PAWN_nameDef] hit every target in simulation. When real threats loomed, [PAWN_pronoun] remained unerring.

BackstoryDef.title: combat veteran
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Deployed in corporate conflicts, [PAWN_nameDef] endured firefights across contested zones. Memory banks stored each casualty as data points.

BackstoryDef.title: textile drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Crafted to produce corporate uniforms, [PAWN_nameDef] stitched logos with precision. As fashions changed, [PAWN_pronoun] adapted to new patterns without question.

BackstoryDef.title: astro navigator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Equipped with stellar charts, [PAWN_nameDef] guided exploration vessels. When coordinates shifted, [PAWN_pronoun] recalculated paths in milliseconds.

BackstoryDef.title: engagement drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Programmed to manage client calls, [PAWN_nameDef] conversed seamlessly across markets. Each satisfied client fed data back into corporate algorithms.

BackstoryDef.title: assistant drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Paired with an artist in corporate-sponsored galleries, [PAWN_nameDef] mixed paints and held canvases. Behind each masterpiece, [PAWN_pronoun] catalogued creative processes.

BackstoryDef.title: cyber infiltration drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Programmed for covert data extraction, [PAWN_nameDef] bypassed firewalls with silent routines. Each successful hack bolstered corporate advantage.

BackstoryDef.title: utility drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Equipped for versatility, [PAWN_nameDef] shifted between tasks on command. In one shift, a builder; in the next, a medic—always meeting corporate demands.

BackstoryDef.title: radiation tester
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Exposed to controlled radiation bursts, [PAWN_nameDef] collected performance data for nuclear safety. Corporate summaries praised resilience, not the silent toll on core systems.

BackstoryDef.title: lockdown survivor
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: During a catastrophic lockdown, [PAWN_nameDef] barricaded passageways and constructed door after door to keep the nightmares at bay. Now, [PAWN_pronoun] finds comfort in building barriers—each door a shield against unseen terrors.

BackstoryDef.title: relic archivist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Charged with cataloging obsolete hardware, [PAWN_nameDef] rescued broken data cores and dusty schematics. They quietly believe every relic holds a story worth preserving.

BackstoryDef.title: peacekeeper drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: After witnessing needless clashes between corporate security units, [PAWN_nameDef] refuses to fire a single shot—opting instead to defuse conflicts with calming protocols.

BackstoryDef.title: night shift operator
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Programmed for graveyard shifts, [PAWN_nameDef] hums through silent corridors under dim emergency lights—finding clarity in the quiet hours.

BackstoryDef.title: deep core miner
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Sent to unregulated shafts, [PAWN_nameDef] extracted rare ores under crushing pressure. Sensors logged tremors as each day risked collapse.
